flavor_text_entries.red:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Its steel-like
hide adds to its
powerful tackle. Its horns are so
hard, they can
pierce a diamond.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
It swings its big
tail around during
battle. If its foe flinches, it will
charge with its
sturdy body.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its tail is thick
and powerful. If
it binds an enemy, it can snap the
victim's spine
quite easily.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
It uses its thick
arms, legs and
tail to attack forcefully. Melee
combat is its
specialty.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
NIDOKING’s thick tail packs enormously
destructive power. With one swing, it
can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this POKéMON goes on a rampage,
there is no stopping it.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
NIDOKING’s thick tail packs enormously
destructive power. With one swing, it
can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this POKéMON goes on a rampage,
there is no stopping it.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A NIDOKING’s thick tail packs enormously
destructive power capable of toppling
a metal transmission tower. Once it goes
on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It is recognized by its rock-hard hide
and its extended horn. Be careful with
the horn as it contains venom.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It uses its powerful tail in battle to
smash, constrict, then break the prey’s
bones.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It swings its big tail around during
battle. If its foe flinches, it will
charge with its sturdy body.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Its tail is thick and powerful. If
it binds an enemy, it can render the
victim helpless quite easily.
flavor_text_entries.black:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.white:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and
its extended horn. Be careful with the horn,
as it contains venom.
flavor_text_entries.y:
One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone
pole as if it were a matchstick.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Nidoking’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power.
With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower.
Once this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Nidoking’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power.
With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once
this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle.
Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle.
Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to
control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s
lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful
and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail
and diamond-crushing horn.
